other_tests.findings: Normal size and function of the right and left ventricles, no clinically significant valvular disease, and a normal aortic root and ascending aorta.
Markedly elevated at 365 μmol per liter (reference range, 0 to 14).
other_tests.changes_over_time: After treatment with betaine, the homocysteine level dropped to 129 μmol per liter.

other_tests.findings: High plasma methionine level (570 nmol per milliliter; reference range, 4 to 44).
The patient was compound heterozygous for two known disease-causing mutations.
